show.title: UNIVERSAL KAADHAL
show.sharing_text: हेलो! मैंने कुकू एफएम पर इस शो को सुना और मेरे ख्‍याल से आपको भी पसंद आएगा
show.sharing_text_v2:
हेलो! मैंने Kuku FM (Android)  पर यह शो सुना और मुझे यकीन है कि आपको भी यह जरूर पसंद आएगा। 
https://links.kukufm.com/GM6aKb
show.description: A young scientist’s experiment connects him with a girl from a parallel universe, and as they fall in love, they must navigate the boundaries of reality, testing love, time, and fate in a quest to reunite against impossible odds
show.description_secondary: A young scientist’s experiment connects him with a girl from a parallel universe, and as they fall in love, they must navigate the boundaries of reality, testing love, time, and fate in a quest to reunite against impossible odds

episodes.title: 16. Malavika finds Maaran in her world
